verses.text: \w Belshazzar|strong="H1113"\w* \w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H5648"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w feast|strong="H3900"\w* \w to|strong="H4430"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand \w of|strong="H4430"\w* his \w lords|strong="H7261"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w drank|strong="H8355"\w* \w wine|strong="H2562"\w* \w before|strong="H6903"\w* \w the|strong="H5648"\w* thousand.

\w Belshazzar|strong="H1113"\w*, while \w he|strong="H1768"\w* tasted \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w wine|strong="H2562"\w*, \w commanded|strong="H4481"\w* \w to|strong="H5312"\w* bring \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w his|strong="H4481"\w* father \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w taken|strong="H5312"\w* \w out|strong="H5312"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w temple|strong="H1965"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*; \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H4481"\w* \w lords|strong="H7261"\w*, \w his|strong="H4481"\w* \w wives|strong="H7695"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H4481"\w* \w concubines|strong="H3904"\w*, \w might|strong="H3904"\w* \w drink|strong="H8355"\w* therefrom.

They \w drank|strong="H8355"\w* \w wine|strong="H2562"\w*, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* \w praised|strong="H7624"\w* \w the|strong="H7624"\w* gods of \w gold|strong="H1722"\w*, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3702"\w*, of \w brass|strong="H5174"\w*, of \w iron|strong="H6523"\w*, of wood, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* of stone.

\w In|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* same \w hour|strong="H8160"\w* \w came|strong="H1768"\w* \w forth|strong="H5312"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* fingers \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man’s \w hand|strong="H3028"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3790"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w candlestick|strong="H5043"\w* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w plaster|strong="H1528"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w wall|strong="H3797"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*’s \w palace|strong="H1965"\w*: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w saw|strong="H2370"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w part|strong="H6447"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w hand|strong="H3028"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3790"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H4430"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*’s \w countenance|strong="H2122"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w changed|strong="H8133"\w* \w in|strong="H8133"\w* him, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* his \w thoughts|strong="H7476"\w* troubled him; \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H4430"\w* \w joints|strong="H7001"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* his \w loins|strong="H2783"\w* \w were|strong="H2783"\w* \w loosed|strong="H8271"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* his knees \w smote|strong="H5368"\w* \w one|strong="H1668"\w* \w against|strong="H1668"\w* \w another|strong="H1668"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w cried|strong="H7123"\w* \w aloud|strong="H2429"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w bring|strong="H5954"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* enchanters, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3779"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w soothsayers|strong="H1505"\w*. \w The|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w spake|strong="H6032"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H6032"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* Babylon, \w Whosoever|strong="H3606"\w* \w shall|strong="H4437"\w* \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* show \w me|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* \w thereof|strong="H6591"\w*, \w shall|strong="H4437"\w* be \w clothed|strong="H3848"\w* \w with|strong="H3848"\w* purple, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w have|strong="H7981"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w chain|strong="H2002"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w about|strong="H5922"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w neck|strong="H6676"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w shall|strong="H4437"\w* be \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w third|strong="H8523"\w* \w ruler|strong="H7981"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4430"\w* \w came|strong="H5954"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*’s \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w*; \w but|strong="H3606"\w* \w they|strong="H3606"\w* \w could|strong="H3546"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3809"\w* \w make|strong="H3046"\w* \w known|strong="H3046"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4430"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Belshazzar|strong="H1113"\w* \w greatly|strong="H7690"\w* troubled, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w countenance|strong="H2122"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w changed|strong="H8133"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w him|strong="H5922"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w lords|strong="H7261"\w* \w were|strong="H7261"\w* \w perplexed|strong="H7672"\w*.

\add Now\add* \w the|strong="H6903"\w* \w queen|strong="H4433"\w* by \w reason|strong="H6903"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H6903"\w* \w words|strong="H4406"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H6903"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w his|strong="H5954"\w* \w lords|strong="H7261"\w* \w came|strong="H5954"\w* \w into|strong="H5954"\w* \w the|strong="H6903"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4961"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*: \w the|strong="H6903"\w* \w queen|strong="H4433"\w* \w spake|strong="H6032"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H6032"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w live|strong="H2418"\w* \w for|strong="H2418"\w* \w ever|strong="H5957"\w*; let not thy \w thoughts|strong="H7476"\w* trouble thee, nor let thy \w countenance|strong="H2122"\w* \w be|strong="H2122"\w* \w changed|strong="H8133"\w*.

\w There|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1400"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w thy|strong="H5020"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w holy|strong="H6922"\w* gods; \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w days|strong="H3118"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w thy|strong="H5020"\w* father \w light|strong="H5094"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w understanding|strong="H7924"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w*, like \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H5020"\w* gods, \w were|strong="H1400"\w* \w found|strong="H7912"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w him|strong="H6966"\w*; \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w thy|strong="H5020"\w* father, \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \add I say\add*, \w thy|strong="H5020"\w* father, \w made|strong="H6966"\w* \w him|strong="H6966"\w* \w master|strong="H7229"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w magicians|strong="H2749"\w*, enchanters, \w Chaldeans|strong="H3779"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w soothsayers|strong="H1505"\w*;

\w forasmuch|strong="H3606"\w* \w as|strong="H3606"\w* \w an|strong="H4430"\w* \w excellent|strong="H3493"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H4486"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w understanding|strong="H7924"\w*, \w interpreting|strong="H6590"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w dreams|strong="H2493"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* showing \w of|strong="H4430"\w* dark sentences, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w dissolving|strong="H8271"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w doubts|strong="H7001"\w*, \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w found|strong="H7912"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* same \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w named|strong="H8036"\w* \w Belteshazzar|strong="H1096"\w*. \w Now|strong="H3705"\w* \w let|strong="H3705"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w be|strong="H1841"\w* \w called|strong="H7123"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* show \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H1841"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w brought|strong="H5954"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*. \w The|strong="H4481"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w spake|strong="H6032"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H6032"\w* \w unto|strong="H6032"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, Art \w thou|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, \w who|strong="H1768"\w* art \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w children|strong="H1123"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w captivity|strong="H1547"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3061"\w*, \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w my|strong="H4430"\w* father \w brought|strong="H5954"\w* out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3061"\w*?

\w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H1768"\w* \w heard|strong="H8086"\w* \w of|strong="H5922"\w* \w thee|strong="H5922"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* \w of|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* gods \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w thee|strong="H5922"\w*, \w and|strong="H2452"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w light|strong="H5094"\w* \w and|strong="H2452"\w* \w understanding|strong="H7924"\w* \w and|strong="H2452"\w* \w excellent|strong="H3493"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w found|strong="H7912"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w thee|strong="H5922"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H7981"\w* \w heard|strong="H8086"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w thee|strong="H5922"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w thou|strong="H2006"\w* \w canst|strong="H3202"\w* \w give|strong="H6590"\w* \w interpretations|strong="H6590"\w*, \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w dissolve|strong="H8271"\w* \w doubts|strong="H7001"\w*: \w now|strong="H3705"\w* \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w thou|strong="H2006"\w* \w canst|strong="H3202"\w* \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w*, \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w make|strong="H3046"\w* \w known|strong="H3046"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w me|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* \w thereof|strong="H6591"\w*, \w thou|strong="H2006"\w* shalt \w be|strong="H3705"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3848"\w* \w with|strong="H3848"\w* purple, \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w have|strong="H7981"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w chain|strong="H2002"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w about|strong="H5922"\w* \w thy|strong="H5922"\w* \w neck|strong="H6676"\w*, \w and|strong="H1722"\w* shalt \w be|strong="H3705"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w third|strong="H8531"\w* \w ruler|strong="H7981"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4430"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H6032"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, Let \w thy|strong="H3052"\w* \w gifts|strong="H4978"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w to|strong="H6925"\w* thyself, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w give|strong="H3052"\w* \w thy|strong="H3052"\w* \w rewards|strong="H5023"\w* \w to|strong="H6925"\w* another; \w nevertheless|strong="H1297"\w* I \w will|strong="H4430"\w* \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w* \w unto|strong="H3052"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w make|strong="H3046"\w* \w known|strong="H3046"\w* \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w him|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* thou \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w Most|strong="H5943"\w* \w High|strong="H5943"\w* God \w gave|strong="H3052"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w thy|strong="H5020"\w* father \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w greatness|strong="H7238"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w glory|strong="H3367"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w majesty|strong="H7238"\w*:
